profile.name: Tom Preston-Werner
profile.headline: @chatterbugapp, @redwoodjs, @preston-werner-ventures Senior Software Engineer | San Francisco
profile.summary: Highly skilled software engineer with a passion for Erlang systems programming and database sharding. Proficient in Ruby, JavaScript, and EventMachine.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Developed Erlang systems programming skills and expertise in database sharding.
Built a TCP routing proxy using EventMachine for efficient routing logic.
